channel.title: Blog by Jens Andresen
channel.description: Recent content on Blog by Jens Andresen

item.title: Tactical Domain-Driven Design - a how to guide
item.description: This is the first post in a series about how to implement the tactical elements of Domain-Drive Design. There will be examples written i C# but they can easily be translated to other languages. Background I just want to tell about my motivation behind writing this series. I’m sure at this time that you are reading this, you will be able to find many other articles (and/or series) about the same topic - and I’m sure that they are all super great!
